patterns.name: entity.name.class
patterns.match: \b(register response parameter|switch to default content|register table parameter|close all child windows|wait for windows count|select from combo box|get project by name|download resources|register parameter|navigate forward|switch to window|wait for element|move to element|switch to alert|switch to frame|delete request|execute script|get screenshot|search student|close browser|context click|hide keyboard|navigate back|patch request|try send keys|wait for page|close window|double click|geo location|kill process|post request|wait for url|get request|submit form|upload file|long swipe|go to url|no action|send keys|try click|keyboard|refresh|scroll|click|login|swipe|wait)\b

patterns.name: entity.name.function
patterns.match: ((?<=\{)android ui automator(?=})|(?<=\{)android data matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)android view matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)windows automation(?=})|(?<=\{)partial link text(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ui automation(?=})|(?<=\{)accessibility id(?=})|(?<=\{)tizen automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ns predicate(?=})|(?<=\{)ios class chain(?=})|(?<=\{)response body(?=})|(?<=\{)css selector(?=})|(?<=\{)status code(?=})|(?<=\{)text length(?=})|(?<=\{)class name(?=})|(?<=\{)attribute(?=})|(?<=\{)link text(?=})|(?<=\{)selected(?=})|(?<=\{)tag name(?=})|(?<=\{)enabled(?=})|(?<=\{)visible(?=})|(?<=\{)binding(?=})|(?<=\{)driver(?=})|(?<=\{)exists(?=})|(?<=\{)x path(?=})|(?<=\{)count(?=})|(?<=\{)stale(?=})|(?<=\{)title(?=})|(?<=\{)model(?=})|(?<=\{)image(?=})|(?<=\{)date(?=})|(?<=\{)text(?=})|(?<=\{)name(?=})|(?<=\{)from(?=})|(?<=\{)url(?=})|(?<=\{)id(?=}))
